basic_info.description: üëã My name is Monica Ramirez. On display are some of the projects from my time learning with Code Fellows. I'm currently working with React and Bootstrap. I would like to further continue my coding journey  and add to my skills by learning more Python üêç and eventually C++. Thanks for checking out my page üôÇ.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: This application's main focus was on data-collection.  A simple polling application that for a fictional company that allowed it's users to vote for a product they would like to see as a new creation. Products are displayed at random with the total votes being rendered on a chart after 25 votes.

projects.title: Pokeball
projects.description: A group project that I collaborated on mainly on its style and layout. The application is a reimagining of the rock,paper, scissors game with a pokemon twist. My focus was on making two of the pages resposive. Through this project I  learned how to use the CSS Grid and Flexbox.

projects.title: Horned-Beasts
projects.description: One of the first apps where I was introduced to React and Bootstrap. A user input driven app that uses votes and user selection through forms and events. Bootstrap Js was used for most of the components. A great learning experience to learn more recent technologies.
